process.command: chainid TEXT, creator varchar(32), owner varchar(32), sharing varchar(8), createdate date, PRIMARY KEY (chainid)
chainid TEXT, chainstep smallint, subprocid TEXT, version varchar(16), PRIMARY KEY (chainid,chainstep,subprocid)
chainid TEXT, chainstep smallint, compid varchar(16), suffix varchar(64), PRIMARY KEY (chainid,chainstep,compid,suffix)
chainid TEXT, chainstep smallint, parameter varchar(32), value varchar(64), PRIMARY KEY (chainid,chainstep,parameter,value)

chainid TEXT, chainstep smallint, compid varchar(16), suffix varchar(64), cellnull integer, celltype varchar(8), scalefac real, offsetadd integer, dataunit varchar(32), measure char(1), PRIMARY KEY (chainid,chainstep,compid,suffix)
